restaurants.restaurantDesc: Al Sham is a punjabi Dhaba in potheri. It is known for its classic tandoor delicacies and the must have , Biryani

restaurantReviews.userReview: Really Great food , and great ambience and staff. Food was great and had authentic taste. Biryani is a must have.
